subject: Athletics and Sports
Recession and Depression
Layoffs and Job Reductions
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: For decades, the sports industry has been largely impervious to the economic cycle. But graduates are finding out that the industry’s growth is slowing, if not reversing.
snippet: For decades, the sports industry has been largely impervious to the economic cycle. But graduates are finding out that the industry’s growth is slowing, if not reversing.
